name: Penguin Fish Fever
description:
Penguin Fish Fever is a time based multiplayer arena combat game where three players find themselves as penguins in a brawl about the fish stocks of an abandoned polar research laboratory.

Grab two friends and start the brawl!

Throw fish and Octopus at them, slap them in the face, stomp them into the ground and get all the fish!

Features: 

- Controller and Keyboard support

- 3 different penguins

- 3 unique bodyattacks

- different control profiles

- Ragdoll fish and Octopus (for the SQUISH)

- assisted aiming

System Requirements:

- Recommended: 3 XBox controllers (if you don't have XBox controllers, try this: https://github.com/x360ce/x360...)

- 1GB of RAM

- 800MB of VRAM

- a rather good CPU

If you want to run this on a laptop, it is recommended to plug it into the wall for optimal performance

This game was a semester project, the names of the Team are:

Jeannette Becker

Sarah Kopisch

Darleen Schipper

Fabian Kober
